properties.areaDesc: Salt Lake and Tooele Valleys; Southern Wasatch Front
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 3:21AM MST until January 12 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Salt Lake City UT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two
inches, with locally higher amounts on the benches.

* WHERE...Southern Wasatch Front and Salt Lake and Tooele
Valleys.

* WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 10 AM MST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and occasional
difficult travel, especially Saturday evening.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including
Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit
weather.gov/slc/winter.

For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of
Transportation, visit
http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial
511.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM MST SUNDAY
